document_data.name: Plastic
document_data.hisrefs: {{Cite web/theedverse/2020-03-01 - Lantan in the 15th Century DR}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Plastic''' was a peculiar manufactured substance found on the island of [[Lantan]] in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Availability: Crude plastics were pioneered, designed, and used by the [[Gondar]] population of Lantan. The recipes for their creation were closely-guarded secrets held by their creator's families, alongside other production methods for substances such as [[concrete]].
